CustomField.description: Derives the Professional Services Methodology Stage for Implementation Cases.
CustomField.formula: IF (IsClosed = True,"Closed", IF (NOT(ISBLANK(PSCase_Deployment_Compl_Date__c)),"5-Closing", IF (NOT(ISBLANK(PSCase_Testing_Completion_Date__c)),"4-Deployment", IF (NOT(ISBLANK(PSCase_Implementation_Completion_Date__c)),"3-Testing", IF (NOT(ISBLANK(PSCase_Planning_Completion_Date__c)),"2-Implementation", IF (NOT(ISBLANK(PSCase_Kickoff_Meeting_Date__c)),"1-Planning", IF (ISBLANK(PSCase_Kickoff_Meeting_Date__c),"0-Handover","UNKNOWN")))))))
CustomField.label: Stage
